biotools.summary:
A machine learning framework for precise 3D domain boundary prediction at base-level resolution.

preciseTAD: A machine learning framework for precise TAD boundary prediction.

preciseTAD provides functions to predict the location of boundaries of topologically associated domains (TADs) and chromatin loops at base-level resolution.

bioschemas.name: preciseTAD
